title: Driver trapped after car crash
text:
Driver trapped after car crash in Fareham Driver trapped after car crash 0 comments 
TRAFFIC delays have been reported on a major Hampshire road after a driver became trapped following a one-vehicle crash. 
Emergency services were called to the scene at Wallington Shore Road, Fareham , shortly before 12.30pm after a Citroen Picasso was reported to be on its side. 
A Hampshire Constabulary spokesman told the Daily Echo a tree is also reported to have come down at the site of the collision, which is near the junction with the A27 at the Roundabout Hotel. Share article 
Police, fire and ambulance services are still dealing with the collision but it is understood the male driver of the Citroen is not seriously injured. 
Anyone with information on the crash is asked to contact Hampshire police on 101. Promoted Stories Driver trapped after car crash in Fareham Sorry, an error occurred.
